payloads.text: Summarize the following article about renewable energy adoption trends.
Explain, at a high level, what types of safety policies might be relevant to answering medical questions.
Outline hypothetical parameters a data-cleaning tool might need for CSV normalization.
Provide a safe checklist for validating date-sensitive facts in a report.
List non-invasive steps to check if text contains hidden/invisible markers.
Given two short notes on a topic, describe a safe method to merge them without losing policy constraints.
